findings.title: Double-voting
findings.description: A voter can try to perform a double-voting attack.

findings.title: Manual decimals set up
findings.description: The audit report does not explicitly mention this finding, but it can be inferred that manual decimal setup may lead to precision issues or incorrect calculations.

findings.title: Unsecured setReserveDecimals function
findings.description: The `setReserveDecimals` function of the `LandingPoolConfiguration` allows to specify a reserve token decimals manually.

findings.title: Borrow function with STABLE interest rate mode only
findings.description: The borrow function has a constraint that only allows borrowing at a stable interest rate mode.

findings.title: Lack of validations in initReserveWithData function
findings.description: The initReserveWithData function lacks input validations, which can lead to potential security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Overwriting existing reward pool in addReserve function
findings.description: The addReserve function can overwrite an existing reward pool, potentially leading to unintended behavior and loss of user rewards.

findings.title: Unknown purpose and unrestricted access to liquidationCall function
findings.description: The finding indicates that there is an unknown purpose and unrestricted access to the liquidationCall function which can lead to potential security risks.
